name: Fall Festival
description: Join us for a day of autumn-themed activities and games.

name: Science Fair
description: Students showcase their science projects and experiments.

name: Winter Concert
description: An evening of music performed by the school band and choir.

name: Book Fair
description: Browse and purchase books from various genres and authors.

name: Career Day
description: Professionals from different fields talk about their careers and experiences.

name: Spring Picnic
description: Join us for a day of outdoor fun, food, and games at the park.

name: Drama Club Play
description: The Drama Club presents their annual play, showcasing student talent.

name: Art Exhibition
description: A display of artwork created by students from various grade levels.

name: Math Olympiad
description: A competitive event where students solve challenging math problems.

name: Sports Day
description: A day of athletic events and competitions for all students.

name: Touch weird kids Day
description: For those adults who can't stop touching minors, today is your day!
